statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE purchase_history->>'$.total_sales' > 1000;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE phone_number='123-456-7890';
SELECT customer_id, name, purchase_date, item_name, quantity, price FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id WHERE Customer.customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, name, purchase_date, item_name, price FROM Customer JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customer.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id WHERE PurchaseHistory.purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT bicycle_brand, bicycle_price FROM Bicycles ORDER BY bicycle_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customers.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT bicycle_brand FROM Bicycles WHERE quantity_available > 0;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM Customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM PurchaseHistory;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Bicycles.bicycle_brand, PurchaseHistory.purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customers.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id JOIN Bicycles ON PurchaseHistory.bicycle_id = Bicycles.bicycle_id;
SELECT bicycle_brand, bicycle_model, bicycle_price FROM Bicycles WHERE quantity_available > 0 AND bicycle_price < 500;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM bicycles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM bicycles WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, purchase_date, quantity FROM customers INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, contact_info.address, contact_info.city, contact_info.state, contact_info.postal_code FROM customers LEFT JOIN contact_info ON customers.customer_id = contact_info.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT brand, type, price FROM bikes WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT address_line1, city, state FROM addresses WHERE postal_code = '12345';
SELECT customer_id, bike_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 1 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT bike_id, brand, price FROM bikes ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2 AND quantity > 1;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, b.bike_name, p.purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN bikes b ON p.bike_id = b.bike_id;
